website_summaries.verdict: With an all-leather outfit, the Nike Cortez Basic Leather is a hit among sneakerheads. It is among the Nike Cortez sneakers that showcase comfort and style. Long-time users love this shoe for its nostalgic vibe as it performs well at the gym or on the streets. Overall, this kick is among the Nike shoes that provide a retro look that has a sleek, minimal and functional design.
pros: The low-top Nike Cortez Basic Leather is lightweight and comfortable, according to most wearers
A lot of users have affirmed that the shoe is durable
Some have noticed the low-top shoe is well-padded inside making it soft
The Cortez Basic Leather is an “easy to break-in” kind of shoe, a few states
Most buyers have perceived this sneaker’s classic silhouette as stylish
A handful of runners have said that it is perfect for the gym or walking long periods
This iteration of the Nike Cortez is affordable
cons: Some wearers have noted that the thick padding and zero perforations in the shoe make the feet sweat especially in warm weather
The Cortez Basic Leather has a tight toe box, which is the reason of the complaints of many buyers

customer_reviews.title: Fake Fake Fake
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely a fake. I purchase this exact shoe atleast once a year. I knew the minute I opened them, they weren't made out of the same material as the ones I purchase usually from an actual shoe store. Fast forward 3 months later and they already looked worse than my pair from 3 years ago that I wear when I work outside. All smashed in and ripped on 1 side. Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Kandy

customer_reviews.title: Not original  Nike shoes
customer_reviews.text: I dont know if is a really a original Nike shoes To me is an imitation they dont got the Nike name on the back
customer_reviews.author: Berlin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my cortez's. Wish they were much cheaper. Could go to fooocker or finishline for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: IJAZZI

customer_reviews.title: the quality of the shoes is good. however
customer_reviews.text: the quality of the shoes is good. however, i tried it first time today after i changed my clothes at the hospital knowing that it will fit and be comfortable, since i have 3 other cortez with same size, although, it felt tight and uncomfortable. its very pinted and feels solid, in which i couldn’t walk properly. i would have returned them if i knew it would be like that. my all other cortez that i bought are the same size and feels the same except this one. i don’t know why. am literally disappointed knowing that i wasted my money
customer_reviews.author: Bashir M.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect classic for style and comfort!
customer_reviews.text: I have a high arch, so I can’t wear flat shoes or I’ll be in pain after a few hours. The Nike Cortez have been my go-to casual shoe that I can wear all day in blissful comfort, and walk around in with style instead of having to wear actually running shoes like a grandpa. I now have six pairs of these shoes and recommend them to anyone who wants a comfortable walking shoe with more style than wearing running shoes in public during the day. These are what Steve Jobs should have worn in place of his ugly running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: SandersPKT

customer_reviews.title: Like meeting an old friend after a long absence.
customer_reviews.text: Like many others, I feel the fit is slightly on the small side right out of the box, but due to the more than sufficient padding throughout the shoe, I feel they will be perfect when they are fully broken in. I was pleasantly surprised to learn that these shoes are available once more. For me they are the ideal driving, all around casual shoe. NIKE, please keep making them.
customer_reviews.author: John Teplir

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these Cortez, classy and very comfortable. Overall look pretty well built.
customer_reviews.author: rubcapgarTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Possible knock offs
customer_reviews.text: Same shoe & size as my other Cortez, these are significantly narrower. Starting to thing that they are not legitimate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but...
customer_reviews.text: I’m overall satisfied with this purchase. I’m a bit disappointed with the amount(or lack there of) padding. I feel like these were made better in years past. I have been buying “Cortez” for years and these are not of the quality that I remember. They are nice but...
customer_reviews.author: Adam M

customer_reviews.title: Order a size larger if you want it to fit like other Nike's
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to buy things off the internet and assume they will fit perfectly. I had previously purchased a pair of Nike Airmax LTD3's, in the same size, and they fit perfectly. The cortez's on the other hand are a bit too short and skinny. Great looking shoe, I would just buy a size or 2 bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Jon R Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: Ive worm Cortez shoes for years probably have owned around 15 pairs. When comparing these to my other ones these are a whole different shape way narrower(same size as other pair). The bottoms are a completely different tread design and the stitching in the front is completely different there is also wheat looks like glue residue betwwen where the bottom meets the top. Basicly either these are not real Cortez sneakers or Nike drastically changed them.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these in fact if I could afford to wear a pair each year for the rest of my life I'd buy a pair as needed because the quality is hundred times better than any I find made in this current era.. I love the red swoosh the most but they are double the price and I'm on a fixed income so have to settle for black swoosh which are just as comfortable and look great too!
customer_reviews.author: Scotty brews

customer_reviews.title: Classic hot pink cortez
customer_reviews.text: Nice classic show in got pink. Just what I was looking for. I have many pairs of Cortez but these one in particular has a narrow and unstructured toe as it's nylon not leather. I wear a 8.5 to 9 and got 9 to have some extra room as they do come narrow... and maybe should have gotten 8.5 better. Overall excited to wear them
customer_reviews.author: Bctrue

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I needed. And there is a little bounce in the heel of the shoe, but I imagine that will fade over time. Good shoes. If I have to say anything negative it would be the order as a whole. The shoes I thought I was getting was solid white. But when they showed that it was being shipped it showed white with a black swoosh. And I was originally upset with it, but the more I looked at it I became okay with it. And when I opened them up I am glad I didn't say anything. They are spot on. Looks good, feels good, fits good.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Peacock

customer_reviews.title: The worst tennis shoes on the face of this earth
customer_reviews.text: Look at thisPair of shoes these shoes are awful,, I would not sell them to my worst enemy They are crooked they are twisted up in the front and they won’t sit flat on the floor And they look like they were crashed behind something for a while and they still decided to sell them they’re all bent up ....they look like a pair of rejects I would never purchase anything else from sneaker RX
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was expecting black
customer_reviews.text: Turns out obsidian is more of a Navy blue. Would've been nice to visibly see that before purchase. Thankfully my husband's ok with it but otherwise he'd not normally pick out Navy blue shoes. Update about a month later: They are falling apart! The older Cortez shoes he had before lasted five years! What gives?!
customer_reviews.author: Wild Willow Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you check the right color upon selection.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed with my purchase. When selecting a color, I selected the first option because it was the color I wanted, which was the black. Upon receiving the shoes I found out they were WHITE and black. While the shipping details did tell me the shoe was selected, my Order details showed that I had ordered the Black model. I will still keep them because they are comfortable, but I was disappointed I had received the exact opposite color that I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: TSN218

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Pair!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd pair of these we have purchased in the past 6 months due to my son outgrowing the first pair. We likes them for school and wears them on a regular basis. They have held up well against an 11 year old. I also like that they aren't mesh and his feet don't get wet when he is camping for Boy Scouts or out at recess. We will probably purchase more of these in the future, and have already purchased a pink pair for our daughter.
customer_reviews.author: JKBlockette

customer_reviews.title: Poorly packaged
customer_reviews.text: If I am paying over 100$ for a pair of sneaker shoes I expect the store to package the shoes with much better care the Nike box was smashed and the shoes were also smashed at the tips I am now having to stuff new paper into the shoes to try and remove the ugly smashed looking tips. the quality of the shoe has changed the outside material feels much softer then before so I dont think they will last as long as they use to.
customer_reviews.author: carlos

customer_reviews.title: These are NOT leather! Totally falsely advertised!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and they arrived yesterday. They are NOT Nike LEATHER Cortez shoes as listed. These are the NYLON ones! Total disappointment! They are still good quality, etc., just NOT what was advertised and NOT what we thought we ordered.
customer_reviews.author: itsmee813

customer_reviews.title: Runs large so buy a larger size
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 11 on all shoes i buy. First Cortez's i bought were form Footlocker, After checkin some reviews on their website i decided to but half a size up to 11.5..... but those were kinda small... with these latest shoes from amazon i bought a full size up, 12, and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow
customer_reviews.text: I can only say they were very narrow. I bought them for my 18 year old grandson and he could barely get into them. Looking at them, they were probably more narrow than my shoes, and I am a woman. Still waiting for my account to be refunded, I returned them about 10 days ago. I would like to add that I have just received the refund, and I should have stated that aside from the narrowness of the sneaker, they seemed to be well made and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: nice look but run small
customer_reviews.text: I've admired the ways these sneakers look for 40 years. CAUTION: They run at least half a size small - even compared to other Nike sneakers. Buy at least a half size larger than you normally buy.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy Nike From
customer_reviews.text: I really like Nike Cortez but this pair was stitched wrong on the front. I don’t know if they were counterfeit but they were still strong and were too tight on the front of my foot . I don’t think I’d buy another pair Nikes from Amazon instead I’ll go to the Nike store directly .
customer_reviews.author: JAN

customer_reviews.title: GSSports sent me a knock-off pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.text: GSSports sent me a cheap knock-off. The shoe ran 1 size smaller than the real Cortez I purchased last week. And there was no padding around the collar. And the leather looked horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Greg R. Vawter

customer_reviews.title: I want my money back!
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made..the front of the shoe is like a cheap plastic and not leather .
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: These do not run small like some other Nikes
customer_reviews.text: I find that Nike's typically run small, but these are just slightly larger than a perfect fit. Still great shoes and I will wear them, but don't size up like you might be tempted because they are Nike's.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Vince

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Nike Cortez!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. I searched everywhere to get these for the man in my life and I finally found them here. They’re authentic and excellent quality. I’m so happy with my purchase and he will be too.
customer_reviews.author: MouthyMama

customer_reviews.title: Only tennis shoes my husband wears!
customer_reviews.text: I cant tell you how many pairs of Nike Cortez shoes my husband has owned for the past 10+ years! They're nice and clean looking, simple yet stylish. Fits true to size.
customer_reviews.author: LoveToShop

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: My son has been wanting these for a while and has tried them in store. Price in Amazon was about $10 less than in the actual store so obviously I bought them. They fir great and he hasn't taken them off since we received them.
customer_reviews.author: Mila

customer_reviews.title: These are nice shoes for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are nice shoes for the price, I've found out though when purchasing these you should order one half size larger than what you wear. I wear a size 9 and a few years ago I bought a pair in that size and they are to tight, but 9 and a half fit just right. Anyways I really like these, they are like the ones I wore 25 years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Scott McMichael

customer_reviews.title: definitely very satisfied and recommend !! A +++++
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and comfortable shoes and the price is really good, definitely very satisfied and recommend !! A +++++
customer_reviews.author: arcadimi

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, but they tend to run narrow and my husband wears out the sides. We were buy the leather ones but the stitching was coming out too often. Found these nylon ones and thought possibly more give, which they had a little bit more but a narrow shoe is a narrow shoe. Wish they would make these in a wide! Overall still a great shoe and always have been,
customer_reviews.author: joannaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Keep up the good work Nike!
customer_reviews.text: I walk on cement all day and these shoes are working out great. I have read other reviews and they said, that these shoes run small from a 1/2 to a full smaller than standard. I ordered a full size larger and they fit just right. I took out the old insoles and replaced them with Dr. Scholl's messaging gel insoles. Keep in mind the original insoles on these sneakers are really glued in, if you decide to take them out it is going to be a job.
customer_reviews.author: Redline 1968

customer_reviews.title: OLD SCHOOL IS THE BEST WAY
customer_reviews.text: what can I tell ya bout these that ya dont already know..thier great.. just as always as they were in 1979 the first yr I was turned on to cortez.... these are the only kick I will wear. For the past ..God!!! too many yrs I have worn them yeah.. they are tight when ya first get em on ya.. but before too long they take shape of your foot and the comfort is like no other..fast shipping too I thought they didnt go under my prime.. but they were here in no time at all.. R Williams Bergenfield NJ
customer_reviews.author: R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nike cortez.
customer_reviews.text: The best shoes to run jump and do activities. This why this is los angeles number 1 shoes of all time. Keep real but dress nice or you might run into problems.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: NOT as described.  FAKE
customer_reviews.text: These are a knock-off, not leather as the description falsely states. Returning for full refund.
customer_reviews.author: K.V.

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes, they’re So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes!!! I wore them all the time in high school. I’m so happy I was able to find them! There is nothing I don’t like about these shoes. The only thing that bothered me was that no where did it say “navy” in the title and that abbreviation “Mtllc” would mean metallic to me. All I wanted was navy and white Nike Cortez and luckily that’s what I got but the title is very misleading . I wasn’t sure what I was getting. I returned one pair already because they were purple space colors and metallic. So be careful when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Kate  Walterman

customer_reviews.title: Shoes dont breath and the toes are tighter then other Nikes.
customer_reviews.text: Although the shoe is very nice, the end of the shoe is tight. After you break it in(which didnt take long) the leather looks streched. My feet never sweat, but with these shoes they did. I would say they are better for fashion then they are for performance.
customer_reviews.author: Juliano

customer_reviews.title: He loved them!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend who had been wanting a pair. These shoes are the real deal! Absolutely legit! Exactly as pictured, but of course they look much better in person! Cheaper than what FL was selling them for! Thank you, thank you, thank you! Would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great, classic shoe
customer_reviews.text: Simple and stylish. Other shoes these days have way too much going on as far as running and basketball shoe designs go. Nike Cortez has been around forever and will always be a good go to shoe. The only problem is that they don't offer an all black version with just the center sole and swoosh being white. It's either black with a white sole which gets dirty real quick or all black which is too much black. Obsidian seemed like it'd work but it was actually a dark blue and not black.
customer_reviews.author: D. Le

customer_reviews.title: Always in style
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. You can never go wrong with these classic sneakers because they will never go out of style. They’re comfortable on feet, lightweight, and supportive. The only drawback is if it’s wet outside and the surface is even moderately smooth you will slip.
customer_reviews.author: Na

customer_reviews.title: Old School Cool.
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking all over the place for these. Nice to find them at a fair price. Ebay has some really expensive pairs, new old stock. I like the quality of the newly manufactured Nikes. They're not so much for athletic use, more for looking cool in Dickies and a flannel shirt. Lots of colors to choose from too.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Troy

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are not true to size.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 8 shoe in almost every name brand. When I ordered these shoes, I ordered an 8.5 just in case. These shoes are an inch shorter than all my other size 8 shoes. Because the shoes are too short, I’m having to return them. Kicksmax is charging me a 10% restocking fee. They won’t cover the shipping so I had to pay $10.90 just to ship them back. WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE EVER!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Retro Love
customer_reviews.text: I am not really much of a Nike guy but I couldn't resist the retro pull of these - Nicely done - Well made and true to original design
customer_reviews.author: David L. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Smooth forever
customer_reviews.text: Always keep a fresh pair of these...Been that way for many years now . I just dig them man and i don't ever seeing that changing. Typically i wear a size 9 but with the Cortez i go up a half size to the 9.5 cause they are generally narrow. Hope this helps-Thanks for reading
customer_reviews.author: The Fabled Wolf

customer_reviews.title: These ARE NOT nylon
customer_reviews.text: Gave 3 stars because picture is of nylon Cortez. Received leather. Keeping them because I have worn leather Cortez for 20 years. Prefer nylon tho. I even found a question that was asking if these were leather or nylon. Answer: Nylon??
customer_reviews.author: Rick Boling

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves Cortez. Last a long time. He goes up 1/2 size because they do run narrow. Love the grey, can’t find in stores
customer_reviews.author: Queen B

customer_reviews.title: NIKE CORTEZ ORIGINAL THROWBACKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: SNEAKERS ARE AWESOME!!!...REAL NIKE CORTEZ...LOVE THE SHOELACE EMBLEM GOES WELL...THESE ARE WORTH THE MONEY ALL DAY!!!....
customer_reviews.author: Mike From R.I.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is awesome. 👌 This shoe brings back memories of my junior high school years.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Tight toes
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoe !...But order the next size up ...Because they are pointy shoes & tight in the toe area..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality of shoes
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pair of shoes love them very comfortable will purchase another pair maybe I'll get a discount LOL
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes and they fit nicely. They have held up well also.
customer_reviews.author: K. Leo Johnson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: The sneaker fit perfectly. Love the look and feel of the shoe. I’m happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Pauline McNary

customer_reviews.title: great shoe wrong picture in description
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the all white shoe as in the picture but got the white show with a black swoosh. The description needs to be more accurate and the picture is definitely off on the show you actually get.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: go to size 11 and if u accidentally buy a 10 1\2 go to ur nearest shoe repair person and have it stretched its a great idea. also remember when u buy a 11 ...
customer_reviews.text: Hey people I'm a huge fan of Nike cortez I wanna talk to all those who wear a size 10 1\2 to size up ,go to size 11 and if u accidentally buy a 10 1\2 go to ur nearest shoe repair person and have it stretched its a great idea .also remember when u buy a 11 you're big toe hits right at the end but ur other toes have just enough space,u can stretch the 10 1\2 if u accidentally buy it ,this should work for all cortez but leather cortex are the best even for stretching also
customer_reviews.author: cboucher

customer_reviews.title: Just like the ones I wore years ago .
customer_reviews.text: I like the styling , the fit and have gotten many compliments on them .
customer_reviews.author: Jamesrpm

customer_reviews.title: These shoe style will live forever.
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes but I have to exchange them for a larger size. They are very comfortable and very stylish. The good thing is that no one really wears them anymore which is why I also really like them.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN MSUYA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality product. The design of the shoe, placement of the leather, the nylon, and the clothe, all balance out well, and lends to a comfortable wear. Obviously not the shoe to wear while working in the garage, the garden, etc. where a more reinforced practical shoe would be recommended. I bought these for my significant other, who tends to be rough on shoes. So far, so food
customer_reviews.author: TeeMee (Kraftqueen65)

customer_reviews.title: Sizes run SMALL
customer_reviews.text: Runs super small so id get a size up atleast . im an 8 and a size 9 wouldve been perfecf . Too bad bc i do liks em just keep in mind they run small.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: They are true to size, but a little snug in the toes. This should easily be corrected with a few wears.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki L Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great Bday Present!
customer_reviews.text: These are a birthday present for my brother. He has been wanting a pair of these shoes since they came out in '06 (or the year they came out). When I asked what he wants for his birthday he said these... so I ordered a pair and thankfully was able to get a good price competitive to our local shoe shop here. Upon arrival these come in a larger box, inside is a brown Nike box with these inside. Brand new, exactly like the picture shows. True to size as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cat LadyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: timeless classic
customer_reviews.text: the blue is really dark blue, it's awesome. the shoes are sturdy and well done. i get a lot of compliments about them
customer_reviews.author: Etienne

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Not made of leather. WAY too small. Seller communication is non existent.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. L.

customer_reviews.title: Run a bit small
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect, but i should have followed the reviews and ordered a size up. Had to send these back and order a new pair half a size larger
customer_reviews.author: Brandi F.

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned these shoes before and these don’t look or feel right. Go to a reputable store to purchase instead.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G.

customer_reviews.title: Great look and comfort, but runs a little small
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend, he loves them, but usually he wears a 10.5 and he said these were a bit too small, so I am going with an 11 for him.
customer_reviews.author: Mellowatts

customer_reviews.title: Run Small & Takes forever!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely run small. Also....they are VERY low heel...almost like a boat shoe & it took almost three weeks to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: High quality sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I was delighted with the shoes, they fit well, are very comfortable and look good. I appreciated that they were made of leather.
customer_reviews.author: Edith Fiore

customer_reviews.title: classic
customer_reviews.text: Classic, comfortable west coast shoe. Pairs well with a hoodie and some comfortable jeans or dickies. Just like i remember from high school except for the fact that they seem to run a little narrow. Not a problem for me my feet arent really wide but if you have wide feet you might want to think twice...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Run Very Small
customer_reviews.text: These are men's shoes, however, they were very narrow for men's. I bought them for my sister who has wide feet and they were way too small for her.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Sullilvan

customer_reviews.title: Go one size up
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, I just got them yesterday. The only problem was they were a little small. I normally where a men's 8. I tried these on at the mall last week to see how they felt. I had to try on a size 81⁄2 in men's. So, that's what I ordered. When they came, my toe was hitting the end of the shoe, making walking in them a bit uncomfortable. So I just returned them and am getting a size 9 instead. I personally would recommend getting one size larger in these shoes. Other than that, I love these shoes, they're classic, stylish, and for the most part comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Seleanah M.

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: At first they felt very good but the more I walked in them the tighter they got. The right shoe is very tight from mid shoe to toe. I ordered 1/2 size larger than normal. I do not know if I went a full size larger if it would make any difference. I walk 2 miles every day and have had to go back to my old Nikes. They look good but just do not feel good.
customer_reviews.author: Darrel Bingham

customer_reviews.title: Old school but Saucony shoes are better
customer_reviews.text: These used to be my favorite shoes but since they’ve gone up in price, I’m not a fan anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Smooth leather and Red print of the border.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are characterized by smooth leather and Red print of the border. After three days, and you can report these sneakers, seems to be a slight problem. -Sneaker heel Nike logo and colors have become increasingly blurry. -A red print across the sole of the foot is spread out over the ground nearby. (It looks a bit blurry on the left than the right shoe)
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Hertzler

customer_reviews.title: genuine...lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.text: For my 17 year old son. True to size and well made. He loves them. Sprayed with leather protectant and they’re still white as the first day. Purchased for Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: 5ft3naquarter

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I gifted them to my significant other and he wears them soooo much
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Old school
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife and she loves them! These used to be the only type of shoe she used to wear when she was a teenager to early 20s and now at 35 she still lives them. True to size
customer_reviews.author: Silver6879

customer_reviews.title: Not leather and not men's
customer_reviews.text: These shoes, super cute, are neither leather or men's as described. They arrived synthetic fabric and women's. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great Pair of Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes! Comfortable & stylish this color goes with everything. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas S Forest

customer_reviews.title: Love these old classics.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for a couple of reasons, one I like the look of these simple white shoes, two I wanted them to wear to a Forrest Gump Party that I am hosting next month. That and a pair of striped socks and i can't go wrong. I know that the red is a bit darker and the heel is also red instead of blue, but close enough. I also think the suede accents only make these shoes look even better.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made!
customer_reviews.text: I've worn these a handful of times. Today I noticed the glue on the inside of the foot, along the sole is coming loose. I don't know how long the sole is going to stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M LaLonde

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Made for long, narrow feet; bought larger hoping they would fit me but the toe box was long and narrow and the width still too tight
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Classic Nike Cortez
customer_reviews.text: Awesome classic Nike running shoes, I’m a grown man with a teenage son he wears the more expensive Nike snickers, foamposites etc. but for me the Cortez classics are perfect with sweats or jeans
customer_reviews.author: Sidney

customer_reviews.title: Whole size smaller
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion these run a whole size smaller. I returned them. I am not sure if these are true Nikes. The size was not sewn into the shoe's tongue flap. They had a small round sticker that said, MENS 9.
customer_reviews.author: LETICIA GARCIA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and quick
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved them! Even with prime EDD was between April 30 and May 10. 2 days after placing order they were here.
customer_reviews.author: Star Fortman

customer_reviews.title: run smaller
customer_reviews.text: Prepare to pay $$ to pay to return your item. Not a complete prime all around product
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Llosa

customer_reviews.title: Life is like a box of chocolates...
customer_reviews.text: I fit an enormous 12 or 12.5 or 13 cause every brand decides to make their shoes weird sizes but that’s not the point. This is a size 8 and was a gift so I imagine the person I bought it for loved it. I know Forrest Gump did
customer_reviews.author: Hansariff Con

customer_reviews.title: not a knock off - very nice classic pair of sneakers
customer_reviews.text: As always with this particular Nike shoe, order 1/2 size up as they run small. This is an actual NIKE product, not a fake, not a knock off - very nice classic pair of sneakers. Arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: MELISSA

customer_reviews.title: Sell what's in the picture
customer_reviews.text: I wish I got what I order...the discriptions was leather and All blue sole like the picture here in this survey..👆I got nylon with white sole...very ugly. Will return.
customer_reviews.author: eduardo sabori

customer_reviews.title: No room
customer_reviews.text: My son does not have a wide foot and these were tight. Love the old style, just to narrow.
customer_reviews.author: DEBRA R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Nike Cortez
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes. These are my fave. I said I know my size since I had my old ones on. So I ordered the same size 12. Perfect match. This is a legit seller. I am very impressed
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Greene

customer_reviews.title: I had purchased these for my husband and he loves ...
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased these for my husband and he loves the way they feel. He usually just wears them to all white parties.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Givhan

customer_reviews.title: Narrow bottom/ tread ....looks good
customer_reviews.text: I am a lady with wide feet usually buy men's nike size 8-.5wide. Took chance buying online not trying on. Wide would have fit better but not an option at time of purchase pretty comfortable. Bottom tread runs narrow for a wider foot difficult to get used to but not uncomfortable. Squeaky in gym but not slippery when running & stopping.
customer_reviews.author: EW

customer_reviews.title: Irregular
customer_reviews.text: The pair I received were irregulars the left shoe was distorted and after wearing it for 10 minutes made my heel hurt. This stuff should be labeled as irregulars. Thats why this product sells cheaper here than say footlocker or some other large retailer. If I would have paid about $20 more and bought it elsewhere this would not be the case. Not paying for returning defective shoes.
customer_reviews.author: MAG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite sneakers very comfortable with socks or without
customer_reviews.author: disp35

customer_reviews.title: Great seller
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe ordered the wrong size. Seller was great for the return! Will order again
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Gibby

customer_reviews.title: Leather is the way to go.
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes and fit ever. These are a classic that go with everything. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: TYLER CRIDER

customer_reviews.title: This is a great old school shoe that doesn't disappoint.
customer_reviews.text: This was a requested Christmas gift from my son. They fit perfectly he really loves these shoes. So glad I got the last pair just in time. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Ball

customer_reviews.title: Quality let down.
customer_reviews.text: I like the sneaker. This is my second pair. Planned on ordering more. However the second pair I got looks like it was a sample sneaker. Beat up inside. If I chose this in a store, I would of picked another pair as one of the sneakers looks tired.
customer_reviews.author: Paul DeSantis
